start_dialogue.start_dialogue_3: This looks like... that field behind my apartment...
start_dialogue.start_dialogue_4: How did I land here? It seems quite comfortable here.
start_dialogue.start_dialogue_5: Maybe I should look around to find out more...
start_dialogue.start_dialogue_6: /A voice in your head tells you to move with WASD/

denialDialogue_1.cube_dialogue_2: Me: What are you?      What am I?
denialDialogue_1.death_dialogue_2: ???: You ask a lot of Questions for someone who is already dead... and a Cube :-)
denialDialogue_1.cube_dialogue_3: Me: Dead? How am I dead? I can still feel and walk... as a Cube that is
denialDialogue_1.death_dialogue_3: ???: We will get to that soon enough, for now fetch me 3 fragments of your memories and we keep talking.
denialDialogue_1.death_dialogue_4: ???: They should be laying around here somewhere, I would suggest you continue in the field behind me.

denialBetweenDialogue.between_1: ???: Go ahed, collect those fragments for me.

fragmentDialogue.fragment1: Me: This seems to be one of the fragments that thing was talking about...
fragmentDialogue.fragment2: Me: They feel kinda... warm.. It almost feels like a warm cup of tea in Winter. Weird.

denialDialogue_2.cube_dialogue_1: Me: Here you go, the Dream Fragments or what you called them.
denialDialogue_2.death_dialogue_1: ???: Nice, they're actually called Memory Fragments.
denialDialogue_2.cube_dialogue_3: Me: So, can you finally explain what is going on here? I don't even know your name or what you are.
denialDialogue_2.death_dialogue_2: ???: Since you got me these sweet fragments, I will make an exception.
denialDialogue_2.death_dialogue_3: ???: You actually may have heard about me, I'm quite literally Death.
denialDialogue_2.cube_dialogue_4: Me: What do you mean you are death? Death is just a State after living, not a being or something.
denialDialogue_2.death_dialogue_4: Death: Of course you would think that, but that doesnt matter at the moment.
denialDialogue_2.death_dialogue_5: Death: What matters is that you are dead. Like fully, no coming back from here. And you are a Cube, I don't know why though.
denialDialogue_2.cube_dialogue_5: Me: Did this happend before? You seem oddly calm even though I'm here.
denialDialogue_2.death_dialogue_6: Death: Ehhh, not really but who cares.
denialDialogue_2.death_dialogue_7: Death: You humans are funny, I like your way of thinking.
denialDialogue_2.death_dialogue_8: Death: For now just proceed through the field to the right and you will find the Gateway to the next Realm.

angerDialogue_1.cube_dialogue_2: Me: I'm... confused... Why is it so dark in here? And what is it with the big Sphere?
angerDialogue_1.death_dialogue_2: Death: Well, this right here is all the anger you experienced while being alive.
angerDialogue_1.death_dialogue_3: Death: Whenever something didn't go your way and you got angry, this sphere grew a bit.
angerDialogue_1.death_dialogue_4: Death: It seems you didn't really think much about reflecting or resolving on this anger inside you, didn't you?
angerDialogue_1.cube_dialogue_3: Me: Reflecting? What benefit would that give me... You can't undo things that are long gone, so why reflect on them?
angerDialogue_1.death_dialogue_5: Death: You clearly don't get it. That's exactly why this big sphere is in here.
angerDialogue_1.death_dialogue_6: Death: Because you never gave a single thought about what happend, you will never be able to move on.
angerDialogue_1.death_dialogue_7: Death: The best time to do this is always now. So do it. Now.
angerDialogue_1.death_dialogue_8: Death: Ahead you will find a few Objects you can destroy, come back once you resolved your anger and destroy this sphere.

angerDialogue_2.death_dialogue_1: Death: So? Are you ready to move on now?
angerDialogue_2.cube_dialogue_2: /You look into the Darkness around you, lost in thought/
angerDialogue_2.death_dialogue_2: Death: You are ready to move on now. Destroy your Anger.

angerDialogue_3.death_dialogue_2: Death: Proceed to the right and you will find the Gateway to the next Realm.

angerBetweenDialogue.death_dialogue_1: You heard me, go on now.
